mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, member_pwd, member_email, member_nickname, member_dt) VALUES(#{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_email}, #{member_nickname}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND member_pwd = #{member_pwd}
SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT member_nickname FROM member WHERE member_nickname = #{member_nickname}
SELECT member_email FROM member WHERE member_email = #{member_email}
SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_email = #{member_email}
SELECT member_pwd FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_nickname = #{member_nickname} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
UPDATE member SET member_pwd = #{member_pwd} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT info.recipe_no,info.recipe_name,mem.member_nickname, info.recipe_img, info.recipe_scrap_cnt, info.recipe_cnt, info.recipe_dt FROM recipe_info info JOIN member mem ON info.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE info.member_id = #{mem.member_id} AND info.recipe_status = 1 ORDER BY info.recipe_dt desc

SELECT info.recipe_no,info.recipe_name, info.recipe_img, info.recipe_dt, info.recipe_status FROM recipe_info info JOIN member mem ON info.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE mem.member_id = #{mem.member_id} AND (info.recipe_status = 0 OR info.recipe_status = -1) ORDER BY info.recipe_dt desc

SELECT info.recipe_no,sc.scrap_no,info.recipe_name, info.recipe_img,mem.member_nickname,sc.scrap_dt FROM recipe_info info JOIN scrap sc ON info.recipe_no = sc.recipe_no JOIN member mem ON info.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE sc.member_id = #{sc.member_id} ORDER BY sc.scrap_dt desc
SELECT board_no,board_title,board_dt,board_cnt FROM BOARD WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY board_dt desc
SELECT report_no,report_title, report_dt, report_status FROM report WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY report_dt desc
SELECT question_no,question_title, question_dt, question_ans_detail FROM QNA WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY question_dt desc

SELECT cmt.boardcmt_no,bd.board_no,bd.board_title,cmt.boardcmt_detail,cmt.boardcmt_dt FROM board bd JOIN board_comment cmt ON bd.board_no = cmt.board_no WHERE cmt.member_id = #{cmt.member_id} ORDER BY cmt.boardcmt_dt desc

SELECT cmt.recipecmt_no,info.recipe_no, info.recipe_name, cmt.recipecmt_detail, cmt.recipecmt_dt FROM recipe_info info JOIN recipe_comment cmt ON info.recipe_no = cmt.recipe_no JOIN member mem ON mem.member_id = info.member_id WHERE cmt.member_id = #{cmt.member_id} ORDER BY cmt.recipecmt_dt desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM scrap sc WHERE sc.scrap_no = #{sc.scrap_no}
